title: Flipkart-like e-commerce app for browsing and buying items

requirements.text: Create a responsive e-commerce home experience with a top navigation bar (logo, search box, cart link, sign-in/out), featured banner, and category shortcuts.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Home page loads without errors on mobile and desktop widths
Navbar includes search input, Cart link with item count badge, and Sign in/Sign out control
Home shows a featured banner and at least 6 category shortcuts

requirements.text: Implement product catalog browsing with pagination or incremental loading, including product cards that show image, title, price, rating, and an 'Add to cart' button.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Product list renders product cards with image, title, price, rating
Users can load more products (pagination or incremental load)
Clicking 'Add to cart' adds the product to the cart and updates the cart badge

requirements.text: Implement search and filtering for products: text search, category filter, price range filter, and sort (Relevance, Price: Low to High, Price: High to Low, Rating).

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Typing a search term updates results
Selecting a category filters results
Price range filter and sort options change the displayed product list
Filter state is reflected in the UI and survives page refresh via URL query parameters or local storage

requirements.text: Create a product details page showing a larger image gallery, full description/specs, price, rating, stock status, quantity selector, and 'Add to cart' button.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating from a product card opens a product detail page
User can select quantity (bounded by available stock)
Add to cart from detail page updates cart state and cart badge

requirements.text: Implement a cart page with editable quantities, remove item, per-item subtotal, cart subtotal, and a 'Proceed to checkout' button.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Cart shows all items currently added for the signed-in user (or local guest cart if not signed in)
Quantity changes immediately update subtotals and totals
Removing an item updates totals and the cart badge
Proceed to checkout is disabled when cart is empty

requirements.text: Implement a checkout flow that collects shipping address and contact info, shows an order summary, and places an order (no real payment processing).

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout form validates required fields (name, phone/email, address lines, city, postal code)
Order summary matches cart totals
Placing an order creates an order record, clears the cart, and navigates to an order confirmation screen
UI clearly indicates that payment is not processed (e.g., 'Cash on delivery (demo)')

requirements.text: Add an 'Orders' page for signed-in users to view past orders and order details (items, totals, shipping info, status).

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Signed-in user can see a list of their orders
Selecting an order shows a details view with items and shipping info
Orders persist across reloads

requirements.text: Add Internet Identity authentication support and user session-aware behavior: signed-in users have server-backed cart and orders; signed-out users can browse and maintain a local cart that can be merged on sign-in.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: User can sign in and sign out using Internet Identity
Signed-in state is reflected in the navbar
Guest cart persists locally and can be merged into the signed-in cart on sign-in (with sensible quantity combining)
Orders require sign-in (user is prompted to sign in if attempting to place an order while signed out)

requirements.text: Backend: implement Motoko data models and APIs for products, categories, carts, and orders, including seed/sample product data available on first deploy.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes query/update methods to list products, fetch product by id, list categories, and search/filter/sort products
Backend stores per-user cart (by caller principal) and supports add/update/remove/clear operations
Backend stores per-user orders and supports create + list + get-by-id
On a fresh deploy, at least 30 sample products across multiple categories are available

requirements.text: Frontend: implement data fetching and caching using React Query for product lists/details, cart, and orders; include loading, empty, and error states for all screens.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: All major screens have visible loading states while data loads
Empty states exist for no search results, empty cart, and no orders
Errors are shown with a retry action where appropriate
React Query caching prevents unnecessary refetches during navigation

requirements.text: Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a distinct shopping-market style using warm orange/amber accents, off-white backgrounds, and charcoal text (avoid blue/purple).

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: All pages use consistent typography scale, spacing, and button/input styles
Primary actions use the warm accent color consistently
No default blue/purple theme dominates the UI

requirements.text: Add generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI (store in frontend/public/assets/generated) for logo, hero banner, and empty-state illustration.

quotes: Create a app us flipkart for buy item

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames
Navbar uses the generated logo image
Home uses the generated hero banner image
Cart or search results uses the generated empty-state illustration when appropriate

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend main actor file).

Do not edit any frontend files under immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Use English for all user-facing UI text.
nonGoals: Real payment processing or payment gateway integration
Seller/admin portal for managing inventory (admin CRUD)
Real-time order tracking, push notifications, SMS/email integration
Third-party authentication providers other than Internet Identity

required: Simple shopping bag logo mark with warm orange/amber and charcoal on transparent background (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Wide e-commerce hero banner illustration with abstract shopping elements in warm orange/amber palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
Minimal empty-state illustration showing an empty cart in warm orange/amber palette on transparent background (empty-cart.dim_800x600.png)
